text: ***BREAKING*** We have secured 100 additional VENTILATORS from the Strategic National Stockpile. As Arizona prepares for an anticipated peak of #COVID19 cases, these will go a long way! THANK YOU, President Trump for listening to our request and making this happen! 1/
